# dropOffLocation

**Instance Property**

The user’s destination.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var dropOffLocation: CLPlacemark? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property with the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INListRideOptionsIntent/pickupLocation] property to determine availability, pricing, and timing information for your rides.

## Getting the Pickup and Drop Off Locations

- **pickupLocation**: The user’s starting location.
